snippet: Gendarmes questioned Dominique de Villepin on Tuesday on suspicion of involvement in fraud that investigators believe was committed by a friend, the businessman Régis Bulot.
abstract: Gendarmes question former French Prime Minister Dominique de Villepin on suspicion of involvement in fraud that investigators believe was committed by businessman Regis Bulot, who is a friend of de Villepin's; investigators say Bulot embezzled more than $2 billion from Relais et Chateaux, a luxury hotel and restaurant network.
lead_paragraph: Gendarmes questioned Dominique de Villepin on Tuesday on suspicion of involvement in fraud that investigators believe was committed by a friend, the businessman Régis Bulot.

headline.main: France: Former Premier Is Questioned in Fraud Case
headline.print_headline: France: Former Premier Is Questioned in Fraud Case
